text:
At the end of the previous time step, you know whether your time series is predictable. If it
is predictable, you will have a list of the top 5 to 10 candidate models that are skillful on the
problem. You can pick one or multiple models and ﬁnalize them. This involves training a new
ﬁnal model on all available historical data (train and test). The model is ready for use; for
example:
 Make a prediction for the future.
 Save the model to ﬁle for later use in making predictions.
